name: Astral Storm
description:
Traveling around the universe, you find yourself stuck inside an astral storm. And the only way out is through fighting multiple waves of alien ships!

This game was made as part of LOWREZJAM 2022.

Controls

  • WASD/Arrow: Move
  • Mouse: Aim
  • Left Mouse Button: Fire
  • Right Mouse Button: Reload

Credits

  • Art: Gustavo Vituri
  • Space Background: Deep-Fold
  • Font: Nathan Scott
  • Sound Effects: SwissArcadeGameEntertainment
  • Music: request, nene, Wolfgang, madameberry
  • Crosshair: Anton Revin
